alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 11:41PM AKST until December 13 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Northerly winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Alaska Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 5 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. Very strong winds could damage property and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snowfall will be showery in nature with several bands that may move through the area. Showers may result in heavy snowfall reducing visibility below half a mile. Visibility to improve as strong winds and snow showers shift out of the area by Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
